original_text: but finding no way to bring him in, because of the crowd, they went up on the roof and let him down with his bed through the tiles into the midst before Jesus.
korean_text: 무리 때문에 메고 들어갈 길을 얻지 못한지라 지붕에 올라가 기와를 벗기고 병자를 침상째 무리 가운데로 예수 앞에 달아 내리니

sentences.original_text: but finding no way to bring him in
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 데려 들일 방법을 찾지 못하자

sentences.original_text: they went up on the roof
and let him down with his bed
